quest.name: One Size Fits All
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened is determined to set to work─or at least to set to setting others to work─immediately.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Seigetsu the Enlightened insists that proper festival attire is of the utmost importance. Thankfully, Gyorei's sewing skills will suffice for the design he has in mind─so long as you are up to the task of providing some pieces.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

With your help, Gyorei creates surprisingly flattering Namazu-sized happi. Meanwhile, an enthusiastic Gyoshin has restored two pavilions in record time, which should serve to house the Namazu newly come to join in the festivities. Promising though all this is, your continued assistance will doubtless be necessary to reach Gyoshin's goal of attracting seven hundred seventy-seven participants─and saving the Namazu people from a fiery, watery, or otherwise unpleasant doom.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to GyoreiMine [Error] in western Ceol AenGather [Error] in western Ceol AenCatch [Error] in the upper Yat Khaal.

dialogue.name: GYOREI
dialogue.text: A river flows below the cliffs, so at least we need not worry for want of water.

dialogue.name: GYOSHIN
dialogue.text: There is much to be done, yes, yes. Fortunately, I brought along my lucky hammer, lucky saw, lucky needle, lucky headknife, lucky anvil...

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: I worry not for the grounds. Gyoshin lacks many things, but zeal is not among them. Attire, however...

dialogue.name: GYOSHIN
dialogue.text: ...Are you implying something about my fashion sense?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Oh, to be so ignorant! What you fail to realize is that festivals are not mere entertainment, but rather divine rituals. It is simply unacceptable to wear one's usual apron, couture notwithstanding.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: According to Hibarisai's An Account of Myself, the people of Hingashi traditionally don happi, colorful vestments resembling coats, on such occasions.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: I can produce an illustration based on what I have gleaned from my readings. However, creating the happi themselves is quite another matter. Alas, where my intellect excels, my dexterity leaves something to be desired.

dialogue.name: GYOREI
dialogue.text: How fortunate that I am a dab fin at sewing, then. Yes, yes. I can make your design a reality.

dialogue.name: GYOREI
dialogue.text: But considering the volume of detail work required, another pair of fins would be ideal. Can I count on your assistance, Forename?

dialogue.name: GYOREI
dialogue.text: Thank you, thank you! Gyofu─er, Seigetsu the Enlightened, can you decide what to delegate?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But of course! My prodigious analytical capabilities have made it clear to me that it would be most efficient for Forename to provide components for Gyorei's use. Metal adornments, to be precise. You will find the necessary materials in the crate.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But of course! My prodigious analytical capabilities have made it clear to me that it would be most efficient for Forename to provide components for Gyorei's use. Durable linings, to be precise. You will find the necessary materials in the crate.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But of course! My prodigious analytical capabilities have made it clear to me that it would be most efficient for Forename to provide components for Gyorei's use. Dye for the finished jackets, to be precise. You will find the necessary materials in the crate.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But of course! My prodigious analytical capabilities have made it clear to me that it would be most efficient for Forename to procure red malachite as pigment for our happi dye. Texts indicate that it may be found in western Ceol Aen.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But of course! My prodigious analytical capabilities have made it clear to me that it would be most efficient for Forename to procure Azim strawberries as pigment for our happi dye. Texts indicate that they are found in western Ceol Aen.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But of course! My prodigious analytical capabilities have made it clear to me that it would be most efficient for Forename to procure a sunshell as pigment for our happi dye. Texts indicate that they are found in the upper Yat Khaal, and respond well when baited with salmon roe.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Rest assured that you may devote your full attention to this assignment. Simply deliver what I requested of you to Gyorei, and we will handle the rest.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Do you find yourself bereft of materials? Fret not! I, in my wisdom, anticipated this eventuality. You will find all that you require in the crate.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Do you find yourself bereft of materials? Fret not! I, in my wisdom, anticipated this eventuality. You will find all that you require in the crate.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Do you find yourself bereft of materials? Fret not! I, in my wisdom, anticipated this eventuality. You will find all that you require in the crate.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Simply deliver what I requested of you to Gyorei. We will see to the remaining tasks.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Simply deliver what I requested of you to Gyorei. We will see to the remaining tasks.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Simply deliver what I requested of you to Gyorei. We will see to the remaining tasks.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Any deliverables should be provided to Gyorei. Your prompt attention to this matter is appreciated.

dialogue.name: GYOSHIN
dialogue.text: I shall have the grounds ready in no time, no time at all!

dialogue.name: GYOREI
dialogue.text: You have what we need? I thought you might still be stuck in unwilling conversation with Seigetsu the Enlightened.

dialogue.name: GYOREI
dialogue.text: Gyoshin has made significant progress as well─and with nary a gaping wound to show for it!

dialogue.name: GYOREI
dialogue.text: I expect that everything will be ready shortly, yes, yes, so please take this opportunity to rest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You and Gyorei have made happi fit for a festival.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Gyoshin has made progress in repairing the pavilions.

dialogue.name: GYOSHIN
dialogue.text: These pavilions should be suitable housing for our large cohort of volunteers. Yes, yes. According to my vision, we must aim to attract seven hundred and seventy-seven participants to avert complete and total annihilation─which means we have only seven hundred and seventy or so to go!

dialogue.name: GYOSHIN
dialogue.text: With these festive happi, I am sure we will recruit the rest in no time. Please, please continue to lend us a fin in the coming days!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Only seven years remain until the Namazu are forever wiped from the face of Hydaelyn...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: But today, their ambitious plans to defy this fate are in motion. What will become of them?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Friendly reputation with the Seven Hundred Seventy-Seven.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Namazu tribal quests are now available from Seigetsu the Enlightened at Dhoro Iloh.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you may now purchase wares from Gyosho.
